title: A Recirculation System for Concentrating CO2 Electrolyzer Products
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01506H, Paper
Tobias A. Kistler, Rajiv Ramanujam Prabhakar, Peter Agbo
Electrochemical carbon dioxide reduction represents a promising path to utilize CO2 as a feedstock for generating valuable products such as fuels and chemicals. Faradaic efficiencies near 100% have been achieved...
